title: Russian interest rate decision

The post Russian interest rate decision appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
content:encoded:
On Oct 22, Reuters was four seconds ahead with the Russian central bank’s key interest rate decision, as the regulator hiked the rate by a more-than-expected 75 basis points. Reuters was also 44 seconds ahead with news the central bank held open prospects of further rate hikes at upcoming meetings.

The post Russian interest rate decision appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
